Name: Upgrade VR
About the game: UPGRADE VR gives an opportunity to test and train the cognitive skills of a human brain with simple and fun training that was developed by neuropsychologists. Train with UPGRADE VR daily and you will improve your cognitive abilities, including: memory concentration and stability of attention reaction hand-eye coordination stress resistance It takes only 10-15 min for a workout a day and it isn’t even boring because of an interesting and fun mode. You train but it seems like you play a game! Track your progress in a mobile app UPGRADE VR. It offers you to watch the list of your achievements, read interesting news about features of the brain and new discoveries of neuropsychology. Сognitive training could be useful as a part of comprehensive recovery after COVID-19. Start to UPGRADE your brain now!
